summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A NOTIFICATION FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V438000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM). THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE PART NEEDED TO REMEDY THE VEHICLE WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.    UPDATED 4/21/15*CN  THE CONSUMER STATED WHILE DRIVING, POWER TO THE VEHICLE CEASED. THE GAUGES WENT DEAD AND THE HEAT SHUT OFF.  UPDATED 04/14/15
